text:
Have you ever encountered an accessibility problem on your menus? Here is the problem that LightHouse is reporting:

This code returns:
<a href="<http://doesntmatter.com|doesntmatter.com>" role="menuitem">

[role]s are not contained by their required parent element
Some ARIA child roles must be contained by specific parent roles to properly perform their intended accessibility functions.

This code is automatically displayed by HubSpot's {% menu %} function and so is the role="menuitem".

Any tips?

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/menus-and-navigation#a-custom-built-menu-using-the-menu-function>

You can fully customize the HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that makes up your menu. We encourage this through providing an example in our boilerplate
